version_description:
- Exciting news everyone! We're having our first event called Myths of Autumn soon! Get ready to meet the beautiful Mysterell and Crystapike creatures and enjoy the event!
- We've fixed Dark Swamps 1 and Bright Field 6 level quests in order to make the levels more fun!
- Some translation errors have been fixed.

- Exciting news everyone! We're having our first event called Myths of Autumn soon! Get ready to meet the beautiful Mysterell and Crystapike creatures and enjoy the event!
- We've fixed Dark Swamps 1 and Bright Field 6 level quests in order to make the levels more fun!
- Some translation errors have been fixed.

- Exciting news everyone! We're having our first event called Myths of Autumn soon! Get ready to meet the beautiful Mysterell and Crystapike creatures and enjoy the event!
- We've fixed Dark Swamps 1 and Bright Field 6 level quests in order to make the levels more fun!
- Some translation errors have been fixed.

- Exciting news everyone! We're having our first event called Myths of Autumn soon! Get ready to meet the beautiful Mysterell and Crystapike creatures and enjoy the event!
- We've fixed Dark Swamps 1 and Bright Field 6 level quests in order to make the levels more fun!
- Some translation errors have been fixed.

- A brand new event is headed your way with plenty of spectacular rewards!
- If you would like to receive notifications when our events are about to start or nearing the end, you can now enable notifications in your device settings.
- We've fixed the error in the Ruins 1 level quest. It can now be completed successfully.
- Includes minor bug fixes and improvements.

- A brand new event is headed your way with plenty of spectacular rewards!
- If you would like to receive notifications when our events are about to start or nearing the end, you can now enable notifications in your device settings.
- We've fixed the error in the Ruins 1 level quest. It can now be completed successfully.
- Includes minor bug fixes and improvements.

- We’ve tweaked a few things so all of our iPhone 11 players can have the full experience!
- We’ve fixed the error in the Shrines 10 and Realm of Mythia 2 level quests. They can now be completed successfully.
- We've fixed the issue making all garden quests unskippable. We apologize for the inconvenience - you can now skip those quests, as expected, by using your gems!
- Includes performance optimizations and minor improvements.
- Includes minor bug fixes and improvements.

- We’ve tweaked a few things so all of our iPhone 11 players can have the full experience!
- We’ve fixed the error in the Shrines 10 and Realm of Mythia 2 level quests. They can now be completed successfully.
- We've fixed the issue making all garden quests unskippable. We apologize for the inconvenience - you can now skip those quests, as expected, by using your gems!
- Includes performance optimizations and minor improvements.
- Includes minor bug fixes and improvements.

- If you have reached 1000 Magic Power, you can now collect Jewelled Eggs. Use gems to buy out the Magical Egg Treasury - a great way to get premium eggs and special items!
- Stay tuned for more fun events that will bring you wonderful creatures.
- We made performance changes that should improve battery life and lower the average device temperature while playing for most players
- We've fixed the issue making all garden quests unskippable.

- If you have reached 1000 Magic Power, you can now collect Jewelled Eggs. Use gems to buy out the Magical Egg Treasury - a great way to get premium eggs and special items!
- Stay tuned for more fun events that will bring you wonderful creatures.
- We made performance changes that should improve battery life and lower the average device temperature while playing for most players
- We've fixed the issue making all garden quests unskippable.
- Includes minor bug fixes and improvements.
- Includes minor bug fixes and improvements.
- Stay tuned for more fun events that will bring you wonderful creatures.

- Includes minor bug fixes and visual improvements.

- Stay tuned for more fun events that will bring you wonderful creatures.
- Includes minor bug fixes and visual improvements.
- We’ve fixed issues causing some players to experience freezes and crashes. Please reach out to our support team if you continue to experience issues.
- We’ve fixed issues causing some players to experience freezes and crashes. Please reach out to our support team if you continue to experience issues.

- The Fiery Elements Event is on its way! Get ready - you'll soon be able to play and have the chance to meet the Fire Golem and Fire Spirit again!
- You'll now be able to get the Leocapra Chest once you complete all event quests. You won't be able to find this incredible creature anywhere else!
- Exciting news! You can now buy Creature Eggs and Nests directly through the Creature Book.
- We’ve fixed the freeze issue for reward claiming at the end of the levels.

- The Fiery Elements Event is on its way! Get ready - you'll soon be able to play and have the chance to meet the Fire Golem and Fire Spirit again!
- You'll now be able to get the Leocapra Chest once you complete all event quests. You won't be able to find this incredible creature anywhere else!
- Exciting news! You can now buy Creature Eggs and Nests directly through the Creature Book.
- We’ve fixed the freeze issue for reward claiming at the end of the levels.

- You’ll now get MORE rewards from the Leocapra Chests. The Level 1 chest gives at least 4 Leocapra eggs!
- The Wizards of Arcania Event is coming back to Merge Magic! You’ll have the chance to meet the Wizool once again!
- Once you’ve made your way back from Arcania, get ready to merge your way to the Sylpunny in the Easter Eggstravaganza Event!

- You’ll now get MORE rewards from the Leocapra Chests. The Level 1 chest gives at least 4 Leocapra eggs!
- The Wizards of Arcania Event is coming back to Merge Magic! You’ll have the chance to meet the Wizool once again!
- Once you’ve made your way back from Arcania, get ready to merge your way to the Sylpunny in the Easter Eggstravaganza Event!

- The Golden Spirits Event is on its way! Get ready - you'll soon be able to play and have the chance to meet Pacatour and Spirit Wolf again!
- FIX: Creatures summoned by portals in some levels now go back to the garden as intended.
- We’ve removed 15K tiles from the events!

- The Golden Spirits Event is on its way! Get ready - you'll soon be able to play and have the chance to meet Pacatour and Spirit Wolf again!
- FIX: Creatures summoned by portals in some levels now go back to the garden as intended.
- We’ve removed 15K tiles from the events!

- Includes performance optimizations and minor improvements.

- We’ve removed 15K tiles from the events!
- Creatures summoned by portals in some levels now go back to the garden as intended.
- Includes performance optimizations and minor improvements.

- We've added 10 NEW LEVELS for you to enjoy!
- We've just brought the Screen Drag button back and you can now switch it on/off in the Settings.
- Buckle up, our brand new Majestic Flames Season is coming your way! Are you ready to meet the beautiful Flameow for the very first time?!
- And as if that wasn't enough, you'll also be able to play the Spooky Garden Event soon.

- And as if that wasn't enough, you'll also be able to play the Spooky Garden Event soon.

- Stay tuned for more fun events that will bring you wonderful creatures.
- And the fun doesn’t stop there, our brand new Fairy Gardens Season will start soon! Make sure to play for the chance to meet the super-cute Pixolotl!

- We've got two extra-special events in this version! The Fiery Elements and the Thunder Mountains Event! Each of these comes jam-packed with unique items and creatures to merge and meet!
- And as if that wasn't enough, our brand new Deep Skies Season will start soon! Make sure to play for the chance to meet the gorgeous Narwing!

- We’ve got two extra-special events in this version! Spooky Gardens and the Arcane Forest Event! Spend the first with the most spook-tacular creatures of Mythia, and let the second whisk you away on a magical adventure - plus, don’t miss the chance to collect these ultra-unique items and creatures!
- Includes minor bug fixes and improvements.

- Clubs are here! You can join your friends’ clubs or create and customize your own club. Chat with other Merge Magic! players and see who has the biggest magic power!

- Clubs are here! You can join your friends’ clubs or create and customize your own club. Chat with other Merge Magic! players and see who has the biggest magic power!
- We've added NEW LEVELS for you to enjoy!
- Includes minor bug fixes and improvements.

- This version has an EXCITING new feature: CLUB CHESTS! Think clubs are fun? Chests make them even better! Work with your club mates to level up and claim Club Chests every week to meet Clubee!
- Discover ALL NEW LEVELS to enjoy!
- We’ve updated our search functionality to recommend more relevant Clubs for you.
- Some of you pointed out an issue collecting gifts from friends - we fixed that too!
